title: The Mage with the Dragon Magic
description: A rising conflict puts Taroâ€™s young reign to the test. As an unknown enemy lays siege to the civilized lands of humans and dragons alike, he must turn to an unlikely ally for aid. The secret to winning the war and saving the world lies in the identity of a shadowy figure driving the attack. However, in order to do so Taro must face his greatest fears. For only in an ancient magic can he pierce the veil hiding their threat but can he do so before everything he loves is destroyed?
author: Irfan  Mirza
